snippet: Kathleen Sebelius and others defended the health care law, but didn't dwell on its main purpose: To provide coverage for 30 million uninsured Americans.
abstract: Kathleen Sebelius and others defended the health care law, but didn't dwell on its main purpose: To provide coverage for 30 million uninsured Americans.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
